Text: A cable gland (in the U.S. more often known as a cable connector or fitting) is a device designed to attach and secure the end of an electrical cable to the equipment.

Triplets:<cable gland

--------------------
Text: Cable gland:  Cable glands may also be used for sealing cables passing through bulkheads or gland plates.
